en: My name is Sam, I am a bot working for [Samantha Smith's Group](https://samanthasgroup.com/en)\. Which language shall we speak\? To cancel the registration process at any time, please enter /cancel
Are you already teaching or taking classes with us?
It seems, we've met before. üòâ Are you sure you want to register another person from the same Telegram account?
How should we address you? Please, specify the name or the nickname
Are you registering as a student or as a teacher?
Please note that by continuing the registration as a student you confirm that you are from the Ukraine.
How old are you? We don't need your exact age, just choose the age group so we can find the best group for you
Unfortunately, teachers in our groups must be at least 18 years old. However, if you are 16 or older, you can host Speaking Clubs
I am old enough but won't host Speaking Clubs
I am 16 and I'm ready to host Speaking Clubs
Unfortunately, we will not be able to work with you. Thank you for your time!
Please, provide your last name (or whatever you want to use instead)
How did you find out about Samantha Smith's Group?
so that you don't have to give us your phone number. But in this case please make sure you don't change your username while you're with us.

Please provide your phone number in *international format* \(starting with \+ or 00\)\. The country code for Ireland is \+353, for Ukraine \+380\. For the full list of country codes, you can consult e\.g\. [this website](https://www.internationalcitizens.com/international-calling-codes/)\. You can also simply press the button below to send us your current phone number
Tap to share your phone number
This doesn't look like a valid email. Please try again.
doesn't seem like a valid phone number. Please try again.

A user with this name and contact details already exists. Please contact your coordinator or, if you do not have one yet, just wait for us to contact you when we find a group for you. I am terminating the registration process. Bye for now!
What's your timezone? Choose your current time (offset relative to UTC is indicated in parentheses)
Move on to the next day ‚û°Ô∏è
You've selected no slots at all! Let's try again
What language do you want to learn\? Please note that you can only choose *one* language right now\. You can add a second language later on through your group coordinator\.
What language\(s\) do you want to teach\?
How long have you been learning English?
Which student levels do yo prefer to teach?
What language (apart from the language being learnt) can you communicate in during classes?

What language (apart from the language you teach) can you communicate in with students during classes? Please note that we are asking about your ability to speak Ukrainian or Russian fluently enough, not about your style of teaching
Only in the language I teach

OK, now we're ready to begin your our placement test\! It will take around 15 minutes\. Please note that *you will not be able to change your answers*, so pay attention\! This test will help our coordinators and teachers pick the most suitable group for you\. Please press the button to proceed\.
This is too hard üòñ Let's finish

Well done! To get more accurate results and find you a more suitable group for you, we would like to ask you to take a speaking test. It will take around 15 minutes, you will need to go to our partner's website. Are you willing to take the test and increase your chances of getting the right group for you?
Please follow the link below and come back to me when you have finished the test\. The same link was sent to your email address\.
‚û°Ô∏è Click or tap here to open the link ‚¨ÖÔ∏è
Can you give regular classes or host speaking clubs?
How many groups would you like to teach?
I can take two right away!
How often do you intend to teach one group? Choose the most preferable option.
What age groups would you like to teach?
What additional help do you require? Please note that we only provide additional help once you have started to take group classes
What additional help can you provide to our students?
Help prepare or edit a CV
Advice on college admission outside Ukraine

Do you have any other skills that you think could help us or our students?

Thank you! Please proceed to the chat with our coordinators so they can arrange an interview with the teacher (LINK HERE)
Thank you! I will message you here as soon as a group becomes available.
Thank you! Our coordinator will contact you on Telegram or by email when they can find a role for you üòä

Sorry, I don't understand this answer. If you were given some buttons, please press one of them. If you got confused, you can restart the registration process by entering /start
